item.title: Lindenmayer-Systems
item.description: During my bachelor thesis I developed a software to generate and visualize plants with stochastic Lindenmayer Systems. I used OpenGL, C++ and QT for this. It also supports simple sinus wave animation of plants and shadow mapping. Source code: https://github.com/eduardheller/Lindenmayer-System
